title: Annual Flu Vaccination Campaign
sitename: Walter Reed National Military Medical Center
cleaned_text: Annual Flu Vaccination Campaign Updated 24 FEBRUARY 2023 Flu vaccines for ages 6 months and older are available in the [Allergy, Immunology and Immunization Clinic](/Health-Services/Specialty-Care/Allergy-Immunology-Service) in the America Zone, Building 19, Mon-Fri, 7:30 a.m.- noon and 1 p.m.-4 p.m. No Appointment Necessary. However, due to high demand, we recommend calling ahead to ensure availability of the vaccine. The flu vaccine information line is available Mon-Fri, 8 a.m.-4 p.m. at 301-295-4511, Opt. 3. According to the CDC, it is safe to receive both your flu vaccine and COVID-19 vaccine or booster at the same time.
